content: What would you say {{bank_name}} is seeking to achieve with this project?
Any urgent work you would like prioritized accordingly?
Do you currently use Temenos products and, if so, can you tell which products and versions you currently use?
Are retail and business client types both served and, if so, are there any significant differences between these two in terms of functionality that you would like to point out?
Besides the Online Banking application, Temenosâ€˜ Infinity supports mobile apps for both Android and iOS. Are all these expected to be implemented?
When would you be expecting to initiate the work discussed so far, and are there any critical dates to be aware of?
If required, how soon would you or other responsible personnel be available to meet with Tailwind representatives, to further discuss and detail the scope of work?
Are you able to point out which CORE is currently used by {{bank_name}}?
About external services and endpoints, such as the ones used for user authentication, payments, transfers, air time top-up, or others. Are you able to  describe which ones you use and for what?
Is it required to have support for multiple languages, if so, which ones?
